name: Pyramid Power Struggle
overview: The goal is to remove as many scribes as possible from the board by jumping over one scribe at a time into an empty space. If a pharaoh is jumped, that is considered an overthrow. Keep in mind that the fewer overthrows you have the better your rating will be, should you win the game. This game by Alan Gardner was published in both Loadstar #026 and the Best of Loadstar #3.
